short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto Whale Helper automates split buying to help you execute your trades more efficiently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Whale Helper is a Chrome extension designed to help cryptocurrency futures traders execute trades more efficiently.

One of the main features of this extension is its ability to automate split buying. With Crypto Whale Helper, traders can set their preferred price range and quantity, and the extension will automatically generate buy orders split into the specified number of segments. This eliminates the need for traders to manually input buy orders for each segment, saving them time and making the trading process more efficient.

Crypto Whale Helper has been designed with security in mind, and it uses industry-standard encryption to protect users' account information. The extension is also easy to use and customize, making it a valuable tool for both novice and experienced cryptocurrency traders.
